author: Special Correspondent
text:
Pappan (48) of Masinagudi was trampled to death by an elephant in Kalmalai reserve forest area on Friday afternoon. According to the sources, Pappan was returning after grazing goats, when he encountered the elephant. He suffered severe injuries in the attack and died on the way to hospital. Division Forest Officer (South) C. Badrasami rushed to the spot with the staff.

The elephant’s movement was being monitored. An initial sum of Rs. 25,000 was handed over to the family for cremation expenses. The remaining amount of Rs. 2,75,000 will be handed over shortly, forest officials said.
title: Elephant tramples man to death
